description: Improving the level of educational achievement in primary schools in deprived regions of Mauritius

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
The overall objective of this project is to support the Government of Mauritius in its efforts towards the alleviation of poverty and the achievement of the Millennium Development Goals. Education is the major component for poverty alleviation and development in Mauritius. 

As a result, the project focuses on the long term strategies developed by the Ministry of Education, Culture and Human Resources to fulfil its commitment to achieve MDGs and the EFA goals by 2015, and accelerating the educational reform through the implementation of the “National Strategic Plan for Education and Training 2008 – 2020”. 

The project aims at assisting the Ministry of Education, Culture and Human Resources in the implementation of the education strategy reform, with specific reference to inclusiveness and access to quality education for vulnerable groups primarily by improving performance rates for schools within the project Zones d’Education Prioritaires.
subproject.title: Zone Education Prioritaire

title: Improving the Level of Educational Achievements in ZEP
